page.title: 08RECREATION CRICKET CLUB
page.content:
Northop Hall will now meet Norfolk side Bradfield,away, in what will obviously be a tough game but one not beyond the capabilities of the Clwyd side.Before that the team have another important date on Sunday 6th July when they meet Colwyn Bay at home in the area semi-final of the Welsh Cup.Hall will field an unchanged side from the one that beat Northop, namely:-Keith Thompson, John Ambrose, Paul Higginson,Alan Beaven, Tony Sparks, Karl Peers, Roy Foster, Ian Rowlands, Hadyn Lloyd, Bill Hughes and Clive Popplewell. If the Northop Hall team beat Colwyn Bay they will face a home game in the area final against the winners of the Pwllheli and Marchwiel clash.
(Taken from a newspaper report FRIDAY JULY 5TH 1985)
